name: Night of Survival
description:
Night of Survival is a First Person Horror game created by a team of 4 in the spring of 2021.  Each member played a critical role on the execution of this game.  While the team's programmer learned a lot about inventory systems and storing numbers, the artist learned 3D animation and integration into Unity.

Team:

Jay K- Programming

Igor Z - Art/Animation

Spencer W - Design and Art

Gavin M - Design and Art

How to Play:

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look, Shoot, and Use Items

Space to Jump
